scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules/vitedge && cp -r ../../src node_modules/vitedge && cp ../../src/bin/cli.js node_modules/.bin/vitedge
scripts.serve:worker: export EXAMPLE_NAME=vue && cd ../worker-site && yarn serve --env vue
scripts.deploy: export EXAMPLE_NAME=vue && cd ../worker-site && yarn deploy --env vue
